titleStmt.title: Sion and Parnassus, or, Epigrams on severall texts of the Old and New Testament to which are added [brace] A poem on the Passion, A hymn on the resurrection, ascention, and feast of Pentecost / by Iohn Hoddesdon.
titleStmt.author: Hoddesdon, John, fl. 1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Daniel for G. Eversden, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
